title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.4 - Advancement of travel expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.4 - Advancement of travel expenses

State Regulations

Funds cannot be advanced for travel expenses. Reimbursement can be made only after travel has been performed, and after
properly submitted voucher has been approved and returned by the Division of

Housing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
